name: Is this a tiger?
description:
Davi is a friendly tourist guide. He loves the jungle, but also knows it’s dangers. The mysterious temple lies deep in the jungle. Tourists are interested in everything. “Is this a tiger? May I pet him?”

Can you help Davi to lead the tourists safely to the next temple?

How to play
  • Left mouse button to move Davi and interact with tourists
  • Protect tourists from tiger and spiders
Team
  • Emil (limered) - Programming
  • Michi (ryupold) - Special Effects, Programming
  • Helen - Design, Animations, Programming
  • Sven (justsWn) - Programming, Sound
  • Daniel (dfva) - Design
Software
  • Unity
  • Some graphic programs
  • Visual Studio
Music
  • Glory Sunz - Rainforest Ambience
